summary: A seasoned cowboy takes a young tender-foot under his wing. They become embroiled in a range war, and end up on opposite sides.
cast: Anthony Franciosa|Michael Sarrazin|Judi West|Susan Oliver|John Anderson|David Sheiner|James Westerfield|Gavin MacLeod|Eddie Firestone|Ed Peck|Harry Davis|Robert Sorrells|Terry Wilson|Eddra Gale|Harry Basch|James T. Callahan|Cliff Potts|Jason Evers|Lev Mailer|Stuart Nisbet|Jack Perkins
